text: Vikrant Singh Rajpoot (born 29 September 1986) is an Indian actor who works in Bhojpuri language films. He started his film career with the film Mehraru Bina Ratiya Kaise Kati. ==Personal life== Singh married actress Mona Lisa in January 2017. Vikrant Singh Rajpoot was a contestant on Nach Baliye Season 8. ==Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Language !!
